168#define AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS (0)
169#define AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_MSK (0x000000FF)
170#define AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS (8)
171#define AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_MSK (0x0000FF00)

173//*****************************************************************************

177//*****************************************************************************
178typedef enum
179{
181 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_HFXTAL = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_RF_XTAL_48MHz << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
182 (0 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
183
185 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_HFRC_24MHZ = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_HFRC48 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
186 (1 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
187
189 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_HFRC_1P5MHZ = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_HFRC48 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
190 (31 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
191
193 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_HFRC_0P5MHZ = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_HFRC48 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
194 (95 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
195
197 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_HFXTAL_DIV2 = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_RF_XTAL_48MHz << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
198 (1 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
199
201 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_HFXTAL_DIV4 = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_RF_XTAL_48MHz << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
202 (3 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
203
205 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_EXTREF = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_EXTREF_CLK << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
206 (0 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
207
209 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_PLL = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_PLLPOSTDIV << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
210 (0 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
211
213 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_PLL_DIV16 = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_PLLPOSTDIV << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
214 (15 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
215
217 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_PLL_DIV48 = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_PLLPOSTDIV << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
218 (47 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
219
221 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_PLL_FOUT4 = ((CRM_DSPPDM0CRM_DSPPDM0CLKSEL_PLLFOUT4 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
222 (0 << AM_HAL_PDM_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
223
225 AM_HAL_PDM_CLK_OFF = 0xFF000000,
226}
227am_hal_pdm_clkspd_e;
